author: Ben Otto
title: Inmates Kill Five Police Officers at Terrorist Detention Center in Indonesia
text:
JAKARTA, Indonesiaâ€”Inmates at a detention center for terrorists, including Islamic State supporters, killed five police officers and took one hostage, police said Wednesday, in a bloody security breakdown that marked the single deadliest attack against Indonesian police.
Police spokesman Brig. Gen. Muhammad Iqbal said that one prisoner was killed in the fighting and that officials were in negotiations with the other inmates involved in the attack.
